name: Infigic Technologies
description:
Infigic is a full service outsourcing company offering eCommerce development, application development, and digital services globally ranging from start-ups to large enterprises. Our experienced team designs and develops customer friendly ecommerce stores tailored to your needs. Our main objective is to build a long term and ongoing business relationship with clients by providing accurate, efficient and cost effective project delivery with satisfaction.
Expertise:• eCommerce development • Magento • Spree commerce• Big commerce• Android and iOS development• Ruby on Rails, HTML, CSS3, PHP and .Net• WordPress and Joomla
This is just a little fragment of what we can do for you. In a nutshell, we help you with your challenges by getting the most out of design, development and digital.
READ MORE...
